definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: And shall we crouch above these graves.
sentences.chinese: 難道我們理應蜷伏在他們的墓穴上。

sentences.english: I am not like Confucius who would teach any level regardless. I am sorry.
sentences.chinese: 像是我理應像孔子一樣，有教無類，來者就教。

sentences.english: They connect us even after it seems like the ties should be broken.
sentences.chinese: 即使貌似理應斷裂，仍舊藕斷絲連。

sentences.english: In short, telecommuting is still a job, so treat it as such.
sentences.chinese: 總之，電信辦公仍是一個工作，所以理應如此對待它。

sentences.english: Those people are also human beings - carry the life which must be respected and saved.
sentences.chinese: 這些人也是人啊，他們有生命，理應得到尊重和拯救。

sentences.english: Every man has owed much to others , and ought to repay the kindness that has received .
sentences.chinese: 每個人都欠別人的，理應饋贈他已得到的仁慈。

sentences.english: It should be easy to deal with climate change.
sentences.chinese: 處理氣候變化理應是一件容易的事。

sentences.english: He got a different type of experience against West Brom, he actually did very well in terms of dealing with it but didn’t get protection from the referee at the time which was disappointing.
sentences.chinese: 他理應在對陣西布朗的時候獲得來自裁判的更多保護。

sentences.english: You deserve true happiness, and Ihope that you will find it soon.
sentences.chinese: 你理應失掉真正的幸福，我希望你能很快找到。

sentences.english: Drag-racing drivers deserve to be punished for putting the innocent at risk.
sentences.chinese: 飆車司機把無辜行人置於危險境地，理應受罰。

sentences.english: Now is the time that face should form another;
sentences.chinese: 是時候了，那張臉兒理應來一個再生。

sentences.english: Adult children, particularly sons, were expected to take in their parents. End of story.
sentences.chinese: 成年子女，尤其是兒子，理應收留父母。

sentences.english: People live this time, should live arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 人就活這一次，理應活的飛揚跋扈。

sentences.english: It was her view that the Windsors should be discouraged from re-entering Royal circles.
sentences.chinese: 以她的觀點，溫莎夫婦理應被排斥在皇室圈子以外。

sentences.english: Her conduct at school well merits praise.
sentences.chinese: 她在學校的表現理應受到表揚。

sentences.english: But if it is true, it deserves to be the  priority of our giving.
sentences.chinese: 如果這是真的，那麼它理應是我們努力的頭等大事。
